release.change: Assist: Access from any screen as the default digital assistant app, allow voice input over HTTP connections, add new shortcut, allow managing assistants
Android Auto: Hide devices that are home from navigation
Add Troubleshooting section to Companion App Settings: Moves WebView Remote Debugging and Logs to new section, adds Thread credential sync
Add support for sensor display precision
Bug fixes, design improvements and dependency updates
Assist: Add support for continued conversations and pipelines, support button intents, add STT & TTS
Add support for sensor display precision
Bug fixes, design improvements and dependency updates
Add Minimal Version - No Dependencies on Google Automotive Services
Hide native mode from full flavor
